meaning_str.bing:
n. 足球；橄榄球；足球运动；屡起争议的课题
网络. 美式足球；中国足球；足球比赛

足球；橄榄球；足球运动；屡起争议的课题
美式足球；中国足球；足球比赛

足球；足球运动；橄榄球；橄榄球运动；屡起争议的课题；被踢来踢去的难题；（尤指别具一格的）足球风格；踢法

sogou-CET6.n: 足球[出现8次)];美式橄榄球[出现0次)]

1.en: In South America we have the concept of the 'pause' in football, the moment of reflection which foreshadows an attack.
1.cn: 南美足球有‘暂停’的概念，即预示着一次进攻的思考瞬间。

2.en: It has a mind of its own. It is too lively and too bouncy and it's contributing to a poorer World Cup in terms of the quality of football.
2.cn: 它就像长了脑子一样，太活跃、太飘忽了，就是它才让这次世界杯的足球水平变得不敢恭维。

3.en: "I think it would be the most natural thing he could do, to get back into the real hotbed of football, " he said of his former player.
3.cn: “我想他这么做很正常，回到真正的足球绿洲，”他这样说自己的前弟子。

0.en: Let's go back to that football game.

1.en: Really? Hooray. Football is a great game.
1.cn: 真的？太好了。足球太好玩啦。

2.en: Pink isn't a very good color for a football shirt.
2.cn: 对足球服来说，粉色好像有点不太合适。

3.en: Daddy, what’s that shirt? It’s my football shirt.
3.cn: 爸爸，那个衬衫是什么？那是我的足球衫。

4.en: It's what the people want! Football just changed, forever.
4.cn: 这才是大家梦寐以求的。足球将从此改变。

5.en: Everyone loves playing football, especially when it's muddy.
5.cn: 大家都喜欢踢足球，尤其是当地上有泥的时候。

6.en: Oh, dear.Mummy! We splashed daddy’s football shirt with mud.
6.cn: 噢，天哪。妈妈！我们把泥弄到爸爸的足球衫上了。

7.en: Daddy Pig loves playing football. Everyone loves playing football, especially when it’s muddy.
7.cn: 猪爸爸喜欢踢足球。每个人都喜欢踢足球，特别是泥泞的时候。

8.en: Daddy Pig loves playing football. Everyone loves playing football, especially when it's muddy.
8.cn: 猪爸爸喜欢踢足球。大家都喜欢踢足球，尤其是当地上有泥的时候。

9.en: Tell me later, Mummy Pig. I've got to get ready for football. Now, where's my football shirt? Here.
9.cn: 一会再说吧，猪妈妈。我要快点准备去踢足球了。我的足球服去哪儿了？在这儿。

10.en: Tell me later, Mummy Pig. I have got to get ready for football. Now, where's my football shirt? Here.
10.cn: 一会再说吧，猪妈妈。我要快点准备去踢足球了。我的足球服去哪儿了？在这儿。

11.en: Tell me later, Mummy Pig. I have to get ready for football. Now, where’s my football shirt. Here.
11.cn: 晚点告诉我，猪妈妈。我必须先准备准备去踢足球。那么，我的足球衫在哪儿？这里。

12.en: Let's play football. Yes, football. Girls against boys. We each need a goalkeeper. Me, me, me, me.
12.cn: 我们来踢足球。好嘞踢足球！男女大对抗。两边都需要一个守门员。选我……选我……选我……选我……

13.en: Back when I was 15, all I ever thought about was football.
13.cn: 回想我15岁时，满脑子里只有足球。

14.en: Pink isn't a very good color for a football shirt. Oh.
14.cn: 对足球服来说，粉色好像有点不太合适。噢。

15.en: Pink isn't a very good color for a football shirt. Oh.
15.cn: 粉红色对于足球衫来说可不是一个好颜色。噢。

16.en: Daddy, you've made your shirt all muddy. Of course, Peppa. Football shirts are meant to be muddy.
16.cn: 爸爸，你又把你的衬衫给弄脏了！当然了，佩奇。踢足球时足球服肯定会被弄脏的。

17.en: Daddy, you've made your shirt all muddy. Of course, Peppa. Football shirts are meant to be muddy.
17.cn: 爸爸，你又把你的衬衫给弄脏了！当然了，佩奇。踢足球时足球服肯定会被弄脏的。

18.en: College ran by real fast, cause I played so much football.
18.cn: 大学生活过得真快，因为我美式足球打得太多。

19.en: Well, what are you doing today, Daddy Pig? I've got a very important meeting with the Daddy's football team. That's just a lot of grown-up boys kicking a football around.
19.cn: 怎么，那你今天干什么呢，猪爸爸？我和爸爸足球队有一个非常重要的会议要开。不就是你们一群成年男人聚在一起踢足球吗。
